BackstoryDef.title: garden kid
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a flower shop. When spring and summer merged, [PAWN_pronoun] could be found jumping among the colorful flowers.

BackstoryDef.title: student
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] received a good education in a public school in the Star Empire during her childhood. [PAWN_pronoun] spent a precious and unforgettable time in school.

BackstoryDef.title: border child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the border area. Due to the harsh living conditions, [PAWN_pronoun] had to fight for [PAWN_possessive] survival earlier.

BackstoryDef.title: problem child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was far from an ordinary person in [PAWN_possessive] childhood, and this characteristic became more prominent after [PAWN_pronoun] beat up [PAWN_possessive] teacher.

BackstoryDef.title: businessmen child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is the child of a locally well-known merchant, and [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in affluent circumstances. XX's parents could even specially invite art teachers from other ethnic groups on other planets to train [PAWN_pronoun]. The long-term life of luxury has brought [PAWN_pronoun] many conveniences, but also some bad habits.

BackstoryDef.title: alien fan
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_pronoun] childhood gazing into the distance, longing to communicate with people beyond astrologers. [PAWN_pronoun] even fantasized about marrying a prince from another race—perhaps a human, or maybe another species entirely.

BackstoryDef.title: twilightknight candidate
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] displayed extraordinary talent that caught the attention of the local magistrate. This meant [PAWN_pronoun] was expected to become a member of "Twilight Knights".

BackstoryDef.title: illegitimate child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the illegitimate child of a noble, raised in a blacksmith's workshop. [PAWN_possessive] foster father made a living crafting intricate metalwork for nobles. As [PAWN_nameDef] grew older, [PAWN_pronoun] developed a growing interest in swordsmanship—though strangely, [PAWN_possessive] father always refused to teach [PAWN_objective] this skill. That is, until [PAWN_possessive] biological father came knocking.

BackstoryDef.title: young pro-gamer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a professional shooting game competitor, young and exceptionally talented. Everyone said it was only a matter of time before [PAWN_pronoun] claimed the highest honors in competitions.

BackstoryDef.title: band girl
BackstoryDef.description: In [PAWN_possessive] first year of high school, [PAWN_nameDef] formed a band with three remarkable girls—each with unique talents: one was a split-personality master of left-right brain rivalry, another angry girl who dropped out and ran away from home, and the third... a zombie? Compared to that, [PAWN_possessive] autism seemed trivial.

BackstoryDef.title: animal friend
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wandered among the mountains, walking freely among the beasts. From a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] shared an extraordinary connection with animals—some even called [PAWN_objective] a little druid.

BackstoryDef.title: hacker kid
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a "genius" hacker who, at a very young age, hacked into the school's network to alter [PAWN_possessive] grades. The result was, naturally, a good beating. It turns out that being a "genius" comes with a price.
